item.title: About
item.description: I was born in the 80’s in a mid-size town in Wisconsin. I feel like my start was quite unassuming. My family had a heavy work ethic and would unwind in true Wisconsin fasion at the end of each week. I spent many of my earlier days playing on or around the Chippewa river. This is where I learned to waterski and enjoy the outdoors. I worked hard through my high school years to the point where I drop some of my extra curricular activities.

item.title: Publications
item.description: Peer Reviewed Pfisterer K, Levitt J, Lawson CD, Marsh RJ, Heddleston JM, Wait E, Ameer-Beg SM, Cox S, Parsons M: FMNL2 regulates dynamics of fascin in filopodia . Journal Cell Biology 2020 Aaron J, Wait E, DeSantis M, Chew TL: Practical Considerations in Particle and Object Tracking and Analysis . Current Protocols Cell Biology 2019 Winter M, Mankowski W, Wait E, Hoz ECDLa, Aguinaldo A, Cohen AR: Separating Touching Cells using Pixel Replicated Elliptical Shape Models .
